ygData.subject: Re: Content type specific crawling?
ygData.msgSnippet: You can prevent this if you include in decide-rules a ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecideRule o ContentTypeNotMatchesRegExpDecideRule. Mario.

You can prevent this if you include in decide-rules a 
ContentTypeMatchesRe=
gExpDecideRule o 
ContentTypeNotMatchesRegExpDecideRule.

Mario.

--- In ar=

>
> Hi all!=

> 
> I have a question about how to exclude dynamic URLs. I'm using regula=
r
> expression rules based on suggestions from previous posting. I would
> =
like to filter out everything except for text/xml and application/xml
> fil=
es. The filters are applied on the scope, midfetch, and the arc

ocessor.

html

http://somewebpage/subdir/?C=3DD;O=3DA

ent these text/html from being
